page1.title: Want Travel?
page1.description: Decide where do you want to go, find your ticket and travel.

page2.title: Need Hotel?
page2.description: You can sort all the hotels in your destination according to price, star and comfort and you can choose the most beautiful hotel.

page3.title: Need Help?
page3.description: You can contact us by mail, phone number or live chat. We will assist you in everything.
